Refurbished Canon EOS RP cameras are on sale $549 while supplies last. We think we’re approaching the end of refurbished inventory for the still capable full frame camera body.

This would make a great camera for those starting out and on a tight budget. It’s still an extremely capable camera. All refurbished gear from Canon USA come with a full 1-year Canon USA warranty.

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS RP Body $549 (Refurbished)
  • Canon EOS RP Body $899 (Retail)
  • 26.2MP Full-Frame CMOS Sensor
  • DIGIC 8 Image Processor
  • UHD 4K and Full HD 1080 Video
  • 2.36m-Dot OLED Electronic Viewfinder
  • 3″ 1.04m-Dot Vari-Angle Touchscreen LCD
  • Dual Pixel CMOS AF, 4779 AF Points
  • ISO 100-40000, Up to 5 fps Shooting
  • Wi-Fi and Bluetooth Connectivity

Canon EOS RP Overview

Impressively small despite having a large full-frame sensor, the Canon EOS RP offers flexible imaging capabilities along with a portable form factor.

Featuring a high-resolution 26.2MP full-frame CMOS sensor along with a DIGIC 8 image processor, both stills and UHD 4K video can be recorded using a broad sensitivity range, from ISO 100-40000, to suit working in a variety of lighting conditions.

Continuous shooting is also supported at up to 5 fps for photographing moving subjects. The sensor also facilitates an advanced Dual Pixel CMOS AF system, with 4779 selectable on-sensor phase-detection points for quickly and accurately acquiring focus during stills and video operation.

Purchase Options

  • Canon EOS RP Body $549 (Refurbished)
  • Canon EOS RP Body $899 (Retail)
